string.text: O-o-oh, what was that?.. And who are You?

Look at that, alive! Well wow, first time I see someone survive falling into a "Whirligig" anomaly. You, dear, were truly born with a silver spoon in your mouth. You could at least say thank you for pulling you out of the anomaly.
Thank you, but I don't remember anything... Something flashed, then a total blackout. Oh my, how my head hurts...
Well, I see you came to your senses. And now lay it out, who are you, what is your name and what were you doing here in Pripyat. Just don't lie, or I'll shoot.

But I'm telling you, I don't remember anything. I can't even remember my name. I'm not lying. I remember I had things in my backpack. And weapons, it seems. But why I came here and what my name is, I can't recall.

Alright, let it be so. And your things and protective suit, which, it seems, saved you - are bye-bye. The anomaly tore all your junk into small pieces and scattered it around. Your money, seemingly, also gone... Check it.
So that's how it is... And who are You and why did you save me? After all, as I understand, it was an extremely dangerous undertaking.

My name is Mervin. I collect "lost souls" like you and convert them to the greatest faith. Faith in the almighty "Monolith". So, you came across me very handily. You are a tough guy, I see, and the "Monolith" brotherhood really needs new fighters right now. Show yourself brave and obedient, and you will become one of us.
And if I refuse?

Such an option is impossible. We'll do this with you now: if you prove that you are good for something, then I will grant you life and help you. But if not, if you chicken out, then death will relieve you of suffering.
And how will I prove what I'm capable of and that I'm not a coward?

It's simple. You will undergo a small test: in the center of Pripyat there is an old ferris wheel. A pack of mutants lives in this place, snorks they call them. There should be about five or six of them there. Go there and destroy the beasts. Then return to me. For this task I will give you my personal "Colt" system pistol and two packs of ammo for it. Ready?
Well, it seems I have no other choice... Give me the gun and I'm off.
Snorks destroyed!

Well done, handled the test. And now you will come with me. You proved that you are brave and agile, we need such fighters. Everything is decided, you will serve the great brotherhood - the "Monolith" brotherhood. Later you will thank me!
Let's go, I have nowhere else to go anyway.
What kind of tasks must I fulfill?

The tasks will be uneasy. I will move you, with the help of the great power of teleportation, granted to us by the powerful "Monolith", to different places, from which you must get out alive and unharmed and return to me. But most importantly, in each of these places one of the manuscripts with our main commandments will be lying. You will have to take it, read and remember what is written there, and then, as you return, give it to me. Only in this case will the task be considered completed.
Everything is clear to me. What is the first task?
For a start, a not particularly difficult "walk" to CNPP-2. Then straight to me.
Well then, I am ready.
I completed the first task.
Well done! Give me the manuscript.
Here, hold it.
What will be the second task?

Now the task will be harder. I will send you to the roof of the Sarcophagus, where the radar is. Conditions are the same. You take the manuscript and bring it to me. And also: be careful on the way back.
Understood everything. Come on, teleport me.
I completed the second task.
Well, good job! Returned quickly. Give the scroll here.
Here, take the second manuscript.

So, good. Other tasks you will receive later. Now we will have to interrupt for a short while, Charon is waiting for you - something urgent. Then, as you fulfill his errand, Charon will tell you how we will proceed with training.
Alright, I'll go to Charon.
Well, should I go to Mervin now?

Yes, now you can calmly continue training. Mervin awaits you in Pripyat, in the hotel. Now I will teleport you into this very hotel. You will find Mervin on the second floor, to the left of room #26. Ready?
Yes, I am ready.
Hello, Mervin! I am back to you.
Well then, let's continue the lessons. Here is the third task for you, a warm-up: did you like riding carousels in childhood?
Liked it in childhood.
Well so you will remember childhood now!
Didn't understand, how is that?
You are a bastard, Mervin, the wind almost blew me off the wheel!
Hard in training - easy in battle!
Here, take it, adversary, the third manuscript.
Well, what's next?
What, liked it? Don't get angry - learn to control your emotions. This will be useful to you in the future.
Alright, don't stall, what else did you come up with for me.
Loved climbing attics in childhood I bet, huh? Well so come on, plunge into childhood one more time!
What is this again?
I have a feeling that you and Charon conspired to kill me.
No one wishes you death. If you complete all tasks and be obedient and brave, then Charon will subsequently make you a mentor. So everything that is done - is all for you.
Alright, understood. Here is the fourth manuscript.
That is good. And now we will move together to one place.
Where to now?
Wow! You do this great.
If you serve "Monolith" faithfully and truly, then I will teach you this science too.
Thanks for that. Well, what about the last test?

Liked jumping in childhood? There's a five-story building behind me. You need to jump from this roof to the balcony of the fifth floor, then from the balcony to another balcony and so on to the end, on the last balcony there will be a manuscript. I don't need to return it to, let it remain as a souvenir. Just make sure you don't lose it, no matter what happens to you... Keep it safe, it will come in handy... That will be the end of your training. As soon as you complete the last task, go straight to Charon. He has an important and responsible job for you.
Oh, now that's business!
Well that's it, go jump. Good luck, hope to see you again. Send regards to Charon from me.
Hello, Borov.
Hello, Strelok.
How do you know me?

You've made such a "ruckus" in the Zone that everyone is talking only about you. As soon as you entered the Bar territory, I was immediately reported that Strelok had paid us a visit... Well, let's get acquainted. And now to business: In short, a difficult man has appeared here, called Count. He is sort of a chief of intelligence here for us. Go to him, he has some important business.
And where do I look for this Count?
He is right here, on the Bar territory, in the brick annex opposite the entrance to the "100 Rads" Bar.
Alright, I'll go find Count.
Hello! Are you Count?
Yes, that's me. And who might you be?
My name is Strelok. Borov sent me to you, says you need help.
A-a-ah, Strelok! Heard a lot about you. Behind your back they call you "Werewolf". You are from the former Monolithians, isn't that right?
Yes, that's right. Well, let's consider we are introduced.
What business do you have with me?
Well, Strelok, we haven't managed to chat about life, so to speak, and you are already about business...
I have no time to chat. If I'm needed, say why, and if not, I'm leaving - many things to do.
Okay-okay, don't boil over... People say that you are a risky man and walk "in an embrace" with fortune. There is a job, just for you.
Listening carefully.

I and my partners Prince and Caesar recently picked up the trail of a mercenary group that was trying to organize the import of a large batch of modern weapons and supplies into the Zone to create a powerful base somewhere on the Rostok territory, to then storm the Bar, or maybe the Warehouses, well, I don't know exactly... And as a result control the passage further into the Zone. We managed, with the help of Knyaz's people, to track and shoot down three choppers carrying the cargo. Then we ran into a cover squad... Had to split into three groups. Barely escaped alive... The mercenaries battered us badly back then. There was a chase after me, so I had to lay low. That's why I headed to the Bar. Prince and his group went to the Warehouses, to look for the place where one of the downed choppers could have fallen. And Caesar intended to move to Yantar, to find the crash site of another helicopter. And then to the scientists, to lick his wounds.
So, and what is required of me?

To start, here is the first task for you. Not far from here, behind the Bar territory. As you go out towards the Garbage. Not long ago a chopper crashed. Where the chopper itself crashed is unknown. To hell with it. So, there, somewhere at the end of this road, they just dropped crates from it. The crates with weapons, I think, survived and remained lying somewhere there.
Interesting things you are telling, Count.

You need to hurry! Find this place and bring me everything valuable that survived from there, so the mercenaries don't get it. The military should have accompanying documents with them. Search for them, they should be in a fireproof case. By these documents we will be able to find out who on the "Big Land" sponsors these weapon deliveries. And then through our people, so to speak, "influence the process". And a request: shoot the mutants, please, who are coming here in crowds, otherwise they keep striving to penetrate the Bar, and this can turn into very dangerous consequences. Here, take a few F-1 grenades, they'll come in handy.
Understood everything. Moving out already. Will deal with the mutants.
Hello, Count!
Well, what's there? Tell me, don't torment.
I was there. What a place! Still break into cold sweat as I recall... Here is what I found and brought the documents.
Well done, Strelok! I didn't doubt you. Give here what you brought. Keep one gun and ammo for it, as agreed, for yourself.
Here, hold it.
Count, how else can I help?

So. While you were absent, Prince contacted me. He is currently hiding temporarily on the Radar. Says that he found the place where the second helicopter crashed at the Warehouses after all, but ran into mercenaries there. They laid down all his guys, bitches, but they mowed down those scum gloriously too. You need to find Prince. And also he was left practically without weapons and ammo. Therefore, before going to the Radar, pick up the gun and ammo from his stash at the Warehouses near the old helicopter, which is rusting somewhere in a ravine, and take it to Prince. You'll give the gun, and then act according to the situation.
But where on the Radar should I look for Prince?

He is hiding somewhere in an abandoned tunnel, where the blocked entrance to the old bunker is. There was also a small military base there before. And now it seems quiet there, according to his words. That's it, go. Find the gun for Prince definitely, and I will warn him now that I sent a "guest".
Understood everything. I'll go find the gun and to Prince on the Radar.
Hello, are you Prince?
Yes, that's me. And you, apparently, are Strelok. Let's be acquainted.
Count asked to pass you the gun.
Aha, thanks! Give it here, very handy! Or mercenaries are preparing a roundup on me here. Tracked me down it seems, and I remained, consider it, without a weapon. So, just one "peashooter".
Here, hold it.
How can I be of use further?

Count probably told you that I found the place where the second mercenary helicopter crashed after all. Well so, you can help us very much if you go and pick up documents from the fireproof case. I definitely saw, a metal case was lying there among crates with weapons, but couldn't reach it. Mercs squeezed in a vice, laid down all guys, only I alone barely left. Four remaining mercenaries chased me through all Warehouses, until they ran into Freedomers. Don't know how the matter ended there for them, but I managed to bolt to the Radar. Although a couple of these freaks, in my opinion, broke through the Barrier after all. I sensed someone behind my back...
So, and where is this place you are sending me to?

Means, this place is at the old checkpoint, practically behind the territory of the Warehouses. There not far from the bloodsucker village. In general, you'll figure it out. Take the docs and immediately to the Bar to Count. But just be careful. There is some spatial devilry there: that downed chopper lost its cargo and as if dissolved... Mysticism of some kind. In short, be on "alert".
Is that all?

Yes, and also a few crates survived there. I think some weapons remained intact there. Mercs didn't have time to take it after all. Rushed after me in pursuit. If you find anything, take it for yourself. Main thing, so they don't get it. And be careful, suddenly those who pursued me are hanging around somewhere nearby here... Well that's it, go with God.
Already going.
Greetings, Count!
O-o-oh, Strelok! With what news did you come?
I was in that place where Prince detected the lost cargo.
And what, found anything there? Were there any documents?
Yes, brought the docs safe and sound. Picked up several serious guns in crates. Prince said that if I find any weapons there, to take them for myself as a reward. Want me to sell to you?
Well, I can buy, of course. You, mainly, give the documents.
Here, hold.
Well, Count, is there more work?
Nothing for now. Come by later, maybe Caesar will appear after all... Without him it's impossible to decipher the information you obtained.
Hello, Count! Barman said you were looking for me.
Yes, was looking. Good that you came. Caesar contacted me recently. He is now sitting out at scientists' on Yantar in the bunker, licking wounds. Need to take something to him.
What needs to be taken to him? Especially since I need to go to Yantar too.

In short, he had three stashes here not far, in the vicinity of the Bar. Well, somewhere in the inner courtyard. So, need to pick up three flash drives from these three stashes, in which Caesar had mercenary cipher codes written down, and take them to him. He is very literate in these matters for us, so he will be able to assemble a single code for decryption.
Damn. Where approximately did he make his stashes?
Well.... Know for sure that on the Bar territory. Not in particularly crowded places, I think.
Well, we'll deal with this. And how do I get to Yantar then? Especially since I have my own interest there too.

And I completely forgot! Of course, the road to Yantar lies through the Rostok factory. It's not easy to pass there, but you can. You have a gift for such things. As you find Caesar's three flash drives, I will send the transition from the Bar to Rostok to your PDA. My people are clearing it just right now. We blocked it some time ago, because all sorts of mutated junk climbed from Rostok into the Bar. But now safety aside, there are more important matters. Need to go to Yantar, so we'll clear the road. Come on, find Caesar's stashes, and we meanwhile will open the transition to Rostok.
Well, you will help me with the transition to Rostok, but how further? How to get to Yantar from there?

Well, Strelok, what questions you ask! There you'll figure it out by situation. Search for "Secret Trails", they are there. As you cross through the tunnel with "Fryers" on Rostok, search around there. There is a transition to Yantar. Not always obvious, but exists, telling you for sure. And what interest do you have there, on Yantar?

Alright, regarding transition to Yantar understood everything. Not the first time searching for secret paths blindly. I'll find it. And my interest is such that I am looking for one person. And this person should be in the Dead City. And the road there is unknown to me. But scientists on Yantar might know it. So I was told. Such are the affairs.

So that's it... Well, eggheads from Yantar, of course, are brainy guys, but right now they are unlikely to help you... Too much changed in the Zone after the last blowout, including needed paths changed their location. In short, do the business with Caesar, return and we'll ponder how to get you to the Dead City. I will help.
Alright, understood everything. I'll try faster.
Hello. Are you Caesar?
Yes, that's me.
And I am Strelok. Count sent me. I brought you your flash drives with mercenary cipher codes.
Ah, Strelok! Glad to meet you. Count informed me about you. I've been waiting. Well, give the flash drives here. And I, in turn, prepared a reward for you for the work. Rare artifact. Here, take it.
Thanks for the artifact! Here are your three flash drives, hold.
Well? Can I be free?
No, Strelok, wait... There is one business here, uneasy. Count told you about three mercenary choppers that we shot down?
Yes, I am aware of the matter. Already visited the crash sites of two. And brought docs to Count from there.

Aha, good. Now to business. The third helicopter crashed somewhere here, on Yantar, behind the lake. Mercs reached it faster than us. And tried to carry out the surviving cargo to a safe place on Rostok. But were afraid to go through the scientist base. Dan and the guys guard everything here after all. So they went around the X-16 laboratory complex. But on the way, apparently, fell into a spatial anomaly. Well, you probably know about such one for sure. Or maybe a controller took them, don't know exactly... So, those mercenaries vanished, but the cargo remained lying. Sakharov helped me track the signal. Signal is weak, but stable. Comes from somewhere in the complex territory...
Can you be more precise?

Don't interrupt me. The place where the signal comes from is in the outer courtyard of the X-16 complex. Behind the gates, opposite the entrance to the laboratory itself. There must be metal cases, at least one for sure. Can get there straight from the factory territory. Passing without protection is unreal, brains boil at once. I'll give you a couple of stimulants, with them you can walk holding hands even with a controller. Help out, bring secret documents. They must be there, I know for sure. It is very important. I would go myself, but can't yet. Wounds haven't healed yet. And I meanwhile will deal with cipher codes.
Alright, agreed. I'll go.
Found the documents, Caesar.
Well done, Strelok! And I just dealt with the codes.
And what now?
Give the docs, I'll take a quick look at them. And you don't leave. Wait a couple of minutes.
Good.
Well, what's there?

Again the same cipher... Need to take these documents to Count. I will also give you a PDA with a unified base code, which I assembled while you were absent. Give it to Count too. He will decipher the data, and then we'll see what to do.
Well okay. Give the docs and PDA. I'll go to Count.
Hello, Count!
Caesar already informed me about everything. Thank you, helped out. Give the PDA with the base code and the documents. Let's see what information is hidden there.
Here, hold it.

Aha. Let's have a look what we have here... so-so... schedule of weapon deliveries to the Zone... lists of agents... some data about secret experiments... Oops! Now this is interesting!.. So, Strelok, don't go anywhere! Wait a little. I think very serious matters are twisting here. Need to read everything carefully and draw conclusions.
Alright, I'll wait... Count. I think something is due to me for such risky work?
Ah yes, of course. Sorry. Here is SR-2 Veresk SMG and a little ammo for it from me and my friends in gratitude. Take it.
Wow, thanks!
Well? What is in the documents?

In short, Strelok. It turns out that weapon and supplies deliveries are carried out to prepare a very large mercenary operation. It speaks of some installation affecting the psyche. With the help of this installation one can sort of "burn out the brain" within a radius of several kilometers. Mercenaries are preparing a massive attack with the aim to capture the Radar territory, install this installation there and thereby block the path to Pripyat and CNPP. It is unclear what the ultimate goal in all this is, but one thing is clear: behind all this stands some group of scientists. Moreover they act not from the "Big Land", but right from here, from the Zone! Who they are and where to look for them - is unclear. But if they succeed in what is planned, then it will be bad for all of us. The Zone will split into two parts, and no one will know anymore what will be happening there, at the CNPP...
What things! And what to do?

You need to find one person, his name is Fang. And pass him this PDA. I uploaded all decrypted information there. Maybe he can clarify something. Well or at least advise what to do. He knows a lot of things and people.
Oh, Fang! So I know him. Met him somehow in Pripyat... And moreover, I am looking for him myself.
Well that's good. Find him, pass him my PDA with decrypted information.
Alright. Give the PDA.
Count. So what about my question?
And for your case there is a solution. My intelligence works sharply.
Well, don't stall, speak, time is pressing. I need to find Mahomet.

Listen carefully: you need to get to the Dead City, right? There is no simple known path there, but there are experienced diggers who know the way. Just like that, of course, they won't open the secret path to anyone. Most likely, they will even say they don't know about such. But one can say that you are very lucky right now. A problem has arisen for them: A very important person disappeared. Went to the Dead City and didn't return. And they desperately need to find him. And there is no one to send right now. And you just appeared handily, can offer them your services, and at the same time gain your own interest.
Aha, understood. And who are these diggers, and where to look for them?
You might even know them. It's the Clear Sky guys on the Radar: Sviblov and his guys.
So that's it... Interesting, why do Clear Sky members go to the Dead City? The Wanderers seem to control everything there now.

Alright, I'll tell you more: few know about this, but the Wanderers and Clear Sky used to be one whole. A special Clear Sky group, consisting of scientific staff and their security, which carried out some closed project funded by a large pharmaceutical corporation. What project that was, no one knows. Everything is kept secret to this day. It is only known that they were based on Yantar, on the territory of Sakharov's scientific base, who helped them in their business. Then something went wrong, and an internal conflict occurred. \n\nIt was rumored that it all started because of women. There were two sisters there: Leila and Karina. Either they didn't share men, or men didn't share them, or some other disagreements on ideological grounds occurred, don't know exactly... But still, I always said: women have no place in the Zone, only troubles from them. So, this detachment split into two groups then: One remained with scientists on Yantar led by Dan, and the second, under the leadership of Leila, left the camp and went deep into the Zone, calling themselves Wanderers. Leila's sister, Karina, remained with Dan on Yantar.
I was at Yantar, but I didn't see any girl there.

And here the most interesting part begins: They said that Dan had an affair with this Karina. And then she hooked up with Sviblov. So Dan got angry and sent Sviblov into exile on the Radar, and Karina left with him too. In short, Clear Sky stepped on the same rake twice... Soon the sisters somehow reconciled, and Karina started visiting Leila from time to time. So this time she went to the Dead City to the Wanderers and disappeared. Sviblov sent his people to search, but they didn't return either. Such are the affairs.
That's how twisted it all is.

And don't say. Straight up Santa Barbara. In short, go to Sviblov on the Radar and hint to him that you accidentally learned about his problem and that you can help. From whom you learned, it is not necessary to say. Well, you understand. Promise him to find out where Karina disappeared, and he will show you the path to the Dead City. Comprende? This is the only way for you to get to the Dead City.
Yes, understood everything. I'm going to the Radar to Sviblov. Thank you, Count, and see you!
Greetings to you, Sviblov!
What brought you to me, stalker?
I accidentally learned that you need help in searching for a missing person. Is that so?
Well, actually yes. We have a problem here... But how did you find out about this?
Where I found out - doesn't matter. The main thing is, I can help you. Well, I'll try, at least. Only I need full information about this case and the transition to the Dead City.
You are a brisk fellow, however. Well okay, we have no choice now. I understand you already know the main essence of the problem?
Yes, in general terms.

In short, a girl disappeared, our "sister". Called Karina. Dark-haired, short, dressed in a blue Clear Sky protective suit. Left five days ago to the Dead City, let's say, to visit and didn't return, although she should have already the next day. I sent a man to search, but he disappeared too.
Do I understand correctly that I need to find Karina or find out what happened to her?
Let's say this: find and if necessary, save and deliver here. Well or at least bring to Yantar into the bunker to the scientists. I won't remain in debt.
Alright, I understood everything. I don't need anything as a reward. Just show where to find the transition to the Dead City. I won't lie, I have my own interest there too.

Alright, agreed. We never showed the transition to the Dead City to anyone, but now is a special case. Therefore I will send the transition point to your PDA right now. It is located not far from here, practically behind the wall of this complex where we are with you now. \nJust hurry, this path is not constant. Can disappear at any moment. That's it, go. In the city you will find the Wanderers. Talk to Leila, Karina's sister, she went to her. Just I beg you, find Karina.
Clear, I'll try. Give the transition mark, and I'm moving out.
Fang, I have a business from Count for you.
From Count? Haven't heard about him for a long time... What business?
Here is a PDA with information about the mercenary assault on the Radar being prepared. Look, maybe you can advise what to do next.

So... (reads PDA) interesting-interesting... Well wow! I heard about this from Ghost, but didn't really believe it. And now I don't know what to think. So many events and problems piled up at once here, and they are all somehow connected. Let's do this: I need to think everything over thoroughly, consult with Ghost and Doctor. And you solve priority tasks for now. Then come to me, we'll definitely come up with something.
Understood everything, Fang. Will definitely drop by later.
Well, what news, Fang?

I talked with Ghost and Doctor. Information that you brought me was confirmed. Indeed, a group of some insane scientists is plotting something very serious and dangerous. The first step planned is to turn on the installation on the Radar and cut off Pripyat and CNPP from the rest of the Zone. For this they hired mercenaries and are trying to arm them to the teeth, and then, after capturing the Radar, turn them into "watchdogs". Then, when no one will disturb them at the CNPP itself, somewhere in the Sarcophagus, deploy secret experiments related to this damn stone, with the Monolith... Well and for protection of the CNPP territory and Pripyat they already have a guard - Monolithians. They have cleared their brains long ago... Well and lastly: seems, preparation has already begun in full swing in the Sarcophagus.
And what to do now?
Well, Barman already told you that you need to find the Doctor at the Swamps. So Doctor will say what to undertake next. Just hurry!
Everything is clear. Means, as planned, going first to Doctor at the Swamps.
Hello, Skinflint. Lukash said that you have some business for me?
Yes, Strelok. There is one request for you. Fulfill it, I won't remain in debt.
Speak, what needs to be done.

We now, as you see, firmly entrenched at this base. Everything would be fine: weapons, ammo, canned food and vodka with rusks remaining from the military are plenty, but just want, you know, freshly baked soft rye bread.
You're kidding! Where did you see rye bread in the Zone, and fresh at that?

And here you are wrong. There is one person, called Baker. So he bakes real rye bread right here, in the Zone. And his bread turns out not simple... Baker came up with some tricky recipe. Bread baked by him doesn't go stale for about a month and tastes like fresh, even if you carry it in a backpack for a week or two. From what and how he makes his bread, no one knows, but the fact remains a fact. In short, bring me 10 loaves of this bread from Baker, and I will thank you very decently. Well what, deal?
Deal. Only where do I look for this Baker? Haven't heard anything about him before.

Well here, now you will know. Before he had a bakery at Agroprom in the southern complex, and then mercs came, and he had to get out of there. Now, they say, he went to trader Sidorovich, will make a new bakery there. Well, Sidorovich you surely know or heard about him. On the territory of Deep Station in the village he dwells. So ask him. He will suggest where to find Baker.
Alright. I'll talk to Sidorovich when possible.
Hello, Skinflint. I brought you ten loaves of bread.
Well, you helped out! Well, huge thanks to you!
Here. Take the goods.
Aha, give it here. And here is a special present from me to you. Here, take it.
Wow! Dreamed about such one for a long time.
Be healthy, Skinflint. Is there any more work?
Why yes, of course there is. A personal matter, and therefore doubly responsible. Wouldn't trust just anyone. Therefore listen carefully. I will speak quietly.
Speak, I am listening.

In short, there is a stalker in the Zone. Called Shuttle. He engages in constantly going to the "Big Land" and passing parcels there or from there for those who hire him. Mostly his clients are scientists from Yantar and experienced loner stalkers. But recently I also had to turn to him on an important question.
Yes, his job is serious...

Agree with you, but he receives big money for it too. Well so, he carried a small suitcase with very important things for me. Which ones - won't say, it doesn't concern the matter. And, in short, he disappeared... Most likely, the poor guy perished in an anomaly or ran into monsters. Although the man is very experienced. If the contents of the case he carried for me fall into "wrong" hands, then I won't be well. I would go searching myself, but can't leave the base right now. Well what, will you help me?
No question. I'll help, of course. You pay well. Give details, and I'm off.

And here just the complexity of the situation appears... Shuttle contacted last time three days ago. Since then neither hide nor hair of him. I beg you, find Shuttle or what remains of him. And most importantly, return the case with the parcel to me. Last time Shuttle contacted from Rostok. Well, you know, it's unpopulated Wild Territory, people disappear there constantly. Said that he looked after a place for a halt for the night in some secluded place and that's it. After that disappeared. Dig through the whole Rostok, but find my case and some information about Shuttle, I beg you very much. I won't remain in debt.
Yeah... What a task you gave me... Well okay. I'll try to help you.
Well, hello, Skinflint. Found I your case.
Oh and good fellow are you, Strelok! And what happened to Shuttle?
I didn't find Shuttle. Apparently, nothing remained of him, except his PDA and diplomat. In the underpass on Rostok was his last shelter among anomalies and monsters. Seems he fell into a trap there.
Well okay. He knew what he was going for. Rest in peace. Give me my parcel and Shuttle's PDA quickly. And here is a present from me not worse than last time.
Thank you. Decent payment.
Hello, Sidorovich! I am looking for one person. Called Baker. They say he went to you.
Yes, that's correct. A baker appeared here recently. A good man, by the way. And what bread he bakes - simply delicious.
Exactly! I am just looking for him for this. So where did he settle?
He is right here not far, located in the abandoned village. I'll send a marker to your PDA.
Aha, understood. Thank you. I'll go meet Baker.
Greetings, Baker.
What did the dear man come with?
My name is Strelok. Skinflint asked me to bring him ten loaves of rye bread, which only you bake. How much do I owe you?
A-a-ah, Skinflint. Remember this freedomer. Not a bad guy. I don't really need money right now. You better help me in one matter, and I will give you ten loaves.
What do you want?

To bake bread, I need, as you understand, flour. Well and something else. "Something else" I will find myself. But with flour it is tight now. Before I had a bakery at Agroprom, and Freedomers supplied me with flour. And then these cutthroats - mercenaries appeared and everything changed. Lukash and his guys went to Army Warehouses, and I had to look for a new quiet place. Well so, when I decided to move from Agroprom, I initially wanted to settle at the warehouses, closer to Freedomers. \n\nI asked five stalkers then to help me carry bags with flour. And already on the very approach to the Freedom base, in the village at Army Warehouses bloodsuckers attacked us. Tore all my kids to shreds. I barely managed to crawl to the transition to the Bar. Had to abandon the bags. Five bags there were, twenty-five kilograms each. Such a pity... I asked Lukash to find these bags after that, but Freedomers are afraid to poke into that village. Then, being in the Bar, I decided not to risk like that anymore and came here. Here seems to be the quietest place, although far from the center of the Zone. But soon I'll establish direct flour supplies, and business will go.
So how can I help?

The matter is simple. Bloodsuckers don't eat flour after all. So somewhere there in the village these bags must be. True, most likely these beasts scattered them. You go to this village at the Warehouses, find and bring me these five bags of flour. And so you don't run five times, I will give you a unique anti-gravity suit. Wearing it, you can easily carry about a hundred and eighty kilograms. Then you will return it to me. I bartered it from master Lefty for thirty loaves. Look, don't lose it!
Ye-eah... That's quite a distance to trudge.

And here I will help you. Listen to me carefully: from here, from the Peacekeepers territory, you can get to the "Bar" itself by one very tricky secret path bypassing the Cordon, Dark Valley and Forest. Yes-yes, don't be surprised. There is such a path. I came here from the Bar by it. Pathfinder showed me this path for twenty loaves of my bread. Under other circumstances I wouldn't open this secret path to anyone, but now the situation is exceptional. I can't go for the bags myself, old already, legs refuse to walk completely... So, if you don't want to go back through posts, cordons and garbage dumps, then use my path.
So, interesting. This changes things completely! If from here one can get to the Bar, then it's a stone's throw to the Warehouses. Speak, where does your path start?

From here go to the north-west of the territory. There, not far from the path, is a railway with an anomaly walking along the wires. This path will lead you to the southern entrance to the Bar. Well if you don't find it, you'll have to go to the Warehouses and back. Same way as you came here. Well what, agreed?
Alright, Baker, agreed. Give the suit and see you.
Baker, here are your bags. All five. Barely found them.
Thank you, Strelok! Can say, you are saving small business in the Zone.
Come on, don't talk nonsense. Here, take the bags and your gravisuit. By the way, the suit is a thing!
Give it. And here are your ten loaves, as agreed.
Aha. That's nice.
Baker, listen. Sell me your gravisuit. I liked it very much. Can carry so much stuff with me.
Sorry, Strelok, can't. No way without it for me, understand yourself.
Yes, understand, of course. But liked it painfully much...

So. If you want the same for yourself, then listen here: at Cordon at the Military base there are more anti-gravity suits, I know for sure. Here is my advice to you: Acquire this body armor from them and take it to Lefty. He will modernize it for you into the same one as mine. I on my part will warn Lefty that Strelok will come with this question... Lefty won't refuse, don't doubt! True, will have to do something for him too, but that's the rule of the Zone, understand yourself...
Thank you, Baker, for the advice. Will definitely use it.
Hi, Lefty!
O-oh, Strelok, what brings you here?
Well I have an anti-gravity military body armor here...
Everything is clear. Want to modernize? Is that so?
Absolutely correct.
Well, this can be arranged... From you, only out of respect to you of course, just one mesomodificate - "Fire Soul".
Understood everything, here is the anti-gravity vest for you, and as I have "Fire Soul" - I'll be right back to you, and you engage meanwhile, I'll be quick.
Well, hello, Lefty!
O-oh, Strelok, brought me "Fire Soul"?
Sure! Here it is.
Come on, come on, let's see...
What, don't trust?
Come on, don't get heated, everything is normal. Here, hold the new thing.
Thank you! Hope this is what I need.
Can I do anything else for you?
Well, actually, there is one more business.
Speak, don't torment.

Yes, strictly speaking, simple matter: I am trying to organize a small bakery here, and for this need to fix the stove. It is completely good for nothing. Missing something for repair. When I left Agroprom hastily, left a lot there. Now I regret.
I understand that you need to bring something from Agroprom?

Yes, absolutely correct. I hid the most valuable in a secluded spot. Boarded up in a wooden crate and hid reliably. You will need to find this place and bring me the crate with spare parts for the stove from there. Well, various iron pieces inside: burners, pipes, manometer.
Alright. And where to look for this place?

Yes, you see, it was night... Was making my way along the edge of the swamp, through reeds in northern direction. Then reached an island and put the crate in some rusty pipe. Thought, I'll return and pick it up later. And look how it all turned out. Where I ended up from Agroprom now. In short, need to search in the area of this island. Can't say more precisely. Only hope is on you, Strelok. Or my assistant drank himself away completely, can't trust him with anything.
And what assistant do you have? I understood you live here alone?

What assistant is he. Drunkard. Vano is his name. So, helps around the house sometimes. But serious business can't be trusted to him. Found a "Freedom" suit somewhere, put it on. Says that he is now "Freedomer" and will leave to them soon. Went completely crazy, the small one. Wandered somewhere for a week, now appeared. Sleeping in the back room on the couch. If you want, can look at this "miracle of nature". Maybe, reason with him with a strong man's word. Pity him, honestly speaking, the guy. Perishing...
Alright, Baker, agreed. Will be at Agroprom, try to find your crate. And now I'll go look at your Vano.
Baker. I found your little crate with iron pieces.
Thank you, Strelok! Now we'll fix the stove, and business will go deftly.
Well, that's glorious. Take your crate.

Wait. Let me thank you. Here, take a flamethrower, fully charged. Made it with my own hands from improvised means. Against bloodsuckers and other filth will be just the thing. If later, when you use all combustible mixture and want to charge it again, then turn to Screw, "Freedom" mechanic. He will help.
Thank you for the flamethrower. Well all, I went. Many things to do.
Hello, Borov. Mercenaries destroyed.
Well, Strelok, well done! Helped out! Can say, saved life.
Come on. Today I helped you, tomorrow you me. In the Zone no other way.
Wait. Let me thank you. Here, take. Twenty thousand rubles won't be extra.
Thank you.
Listen, Borov. I have a proposal for you.
What proposal?

Well I, in connection with today's situation with mercenaries at southern checkpoint, looked closer at your fortifications and want to say that they are good for nothing. One more such sudden attack and you are done for. Especially weak looks the northern checkpoint.
Yes I see it myself. Well and what exactly do you propose?

I have guys familiar, free stalkers. Used to work as military builders. Good specialists in various fort structures. Could agree for a reasonable fee with them, so they strengthen or redo both checkpoints.
And what to think here? Proposal is good. Or the gang that lives here, can't do a damn thing, only guzzle vodka and swear eternally. What is required of me?
Well, I think, to start need to determine the front of work and make an estimate. Agree on money and then start work. For me, to start talking with them, need to clearly outline the situation.
Well lead them to me, we'll chat.

No, they won't go like that. Let me first outline the situation to them in detail, and they already come with proposal and estimate. But for this I need a detailed map of the Bar and adjacent territories, not to explain on fingers to them. Is there such map?
Well, I have such map. Want - take. Only return definitely.
That is good. Means, agreed. Give the map and I went to the guys.
Borov, I am looking for one person here.
What person?
Called Antiquarian. Say, one can acquire rare ammo from him.

There is such speculator - rubs in all sorts of old stuff for triple price, acquired somewhere at Army Warehouses rarity arsenal of past century, fixed guns, cleaned and now passes for antiques... He is just here right now. Search him on the territory of the prison, in the house, that to the right from passage and slightly in depth.
Thank you, going find Antiquarian.
Good health, are you Antiquarian?
Yes it's me. Need something from me?
Yes, Noodle told me that you have ammo for revolver, can you sell?
Sell won't sell, but can exchange. Change one pack of ammo for 3 bottles of vodka.
Well then, deal, going find 3 bottles for you.
Here, hold three bottles of vodka.
O, that is business! Give it here the darling. And here is for you, as agreed, your pack.
Give. And do you have more ammo?
Yes, I have more ammo for revolver. Bring three more bottles and another pack is yours.
Alright, agreed.
Antiquarian, I have more vodka for exchange.
That is good, give three bottles of vodka and take pack of ammo.
Here, hold.
And hello to you. Who might you be?

My name is Pathfinder, but unlikely it will tell you anything. And I wait here, actually for you, Strelok. But first let's have a glass, don't mind? Just no one to talk heart to heart here... understand?
Understand. But only one glass, no more. I have no time.
Well that is good. Cheers...
Oh, went well... And now say, why did you need me?
Ye-eah, good vodka in the Bar nowadays... Well so, Strelok, one very respected person wants to meet you.
Who is such?
He asked not to name him, for safety.
Well, alright. And where does he wait for me, this respected incognito?

There is one secret place. At Agroprom, in underground catacombs. Entrance there knows only he alone. And he told me so: "Tell Strelok to go urgently to Agroprom. There, near the northern building will find blocked entrance to catacombs. Well and further I will open passage for him..."
Well, you intrigued me... Alright, going find stranger, since I am so needed to him.
Here, turns out, who waits for me here! Greetings to you, Doctor! And why such conspiracy?

Hush, hush, Strelok. Don't rejoice particularly. Not everything is so simple now. You, probably, already know or heard that something huge is plotted in the Zone. In Pripyat now uneasy, mercenaries activated. My heart feels that hard times are coming.
So what, you moved here from Swamps now?

No, not everything is so dramatic yet. I am here, so to speak, "passing through". Went to Agroprom, for some herbs. Now going back to Swamps, and dropped here to rest. Here quiet, hidden from strangers eyes place, as you see yourself.
Clear. And Pathfinder, who is he?

Pathfinder - he is my old friend and guide. So don't worry, proven man, more than once rescued me from trouble. Better guide than him in whole Zone not find. He finds such paths that sometimes you marvel at his flair and intuition. You stop by him later, talk, maybe, mutual interest will be found.
Understood. Will stop by Pathfinder when possible. And why did you search for me? Have business for me?

Listen, Strelok, possibly, Feldsher with Ghost and Fang will have to move here from Pripyat in near future, and, possibly, me too. Therefore will need reliable place where one can hide for long time, understand? Yes and to you it will be useful too. We are now one team... I beg you, organize a stash here, about which only we four will know. Except you now no one else will be to look after this stash. Collect here just in case supply of provisions and weapons, okay?
Alright, Doctor, agreed. Especially since place is gorgeous. Not a single beast will poke here.

Well, that is glorious. Use this place for yourself as you deem necessary. Entrance here for now will be from top, from Agroprom, but then will need to block it for good. Unreliable it is... Teleport, that blocks entrance from bottom from catacombs, already aged. It will stop functioning soon itself. Therefore you, Strelok, somehow later must secure this stash from strangers and monsters...

Alright, I in bottom, in dungeon, will place tripwire at entrance to hole, as soon as blocking teleport stops acting. So that, Doctor, careful there, if come without me. And pass to your Feldsher, Ghost and Fang, let be more careful. From top, from Agroprom, entrance to stash will block tightly later, can not worry. Entrance will remain only from bottom, from catacombs.

Agreed. Let be so. Exit teleport from this stash to Agroprom I installed in hole. Use it for now. Later, when lower teleport, blocking entrance to hole, disappears, then this one, working for exit, also will disappear.
Everything clear. Well, I went, see you.
Hello, Pathfinder. Met I with your incognito.
Well that is excellent. Names here aloud won't pronounce.
Listen, he told me that you are best guide in Zone and know many secret paths, unknown to others. Is it true?

Yes, it is so. Many secret paths known to me. But not everything is so simple, as you think. If you really interested in possibility to secretly move around Zone, cross from one territory to another where others can't, then I can assist you in this.
You ask! Of course, interests me.

Well, then listen: Secret paths in Zone open not often and remain available for movement for small period of time, on average about a week. To find such paths, need very rare artifact. Called "Guide". Appears very rarely and in places deaf and unpopulated. And, as rule, not far from that place, where it was born, will be path located. True, one but - by such paths can go only in one direction. Return have to either by known to all routes, or search new artifact on that territory, from which want to find secret path.
Interesting. Didn't hear about this before. And what is needed to find this path for sure?

If find artifact "Guide", then carry it to me. I will be able to determine exact location of path on that territory where you found artifact and where this path will lead you. Well and then, put mark on PDA for you, so that path you could for sure find. Well and as payment for my services will take from you this very artifact.
Labs, agreed. And how does it look at least, this artifact?

Yes you won't confuse it with any other. "Guide" has unearthly beauty burgundy glow and rays. Most often "Guide" can be found on Rostok, on Cordon, on Agroprom and on Army Warehouses. In other places it is great rarity.
Understood everything. As find artifact "Guide", then straight to you.
Anything else?
Yes, Strelok. There is one more difficult matter.
Difficult matters - that's exactly for me.

Well, then listen carefully: I must soon move out to Pripyat, but I have to go through Yantar, and then through the Pripyat underground bypassing the Radar. The road is calm on one hand, deserted, and few mutants. But on the other hand, there is an impassable multitude of anomalies. And I need one artifact for my journey, a very rare one. It is called "Liquidator". Its only and main property is that when thrown on the ground, it destroys all known anomalies within a radius of 15 meters. That's what I need. And you will help very much if you obtain one such artifact for me. More than one is not needed, as it is of reusable action.
Very interesting. Never heard of such an art.

And here is the most important part. There is a small group of stalkers in the Zone, about ten people. They call themselves "Railroaders". Very strange guys, I tell you. Their main stalker is nicknamed "Lector". And the rest, rumor has it, are sort of like twin brothers all. And there are rumors that they are cannibals... So this group lives somewhere behind the Rostok factory territory. They are the best artifact seekers and mutant hunters in the Zone. They look severe of course, strongly resemble zombies, but they say it's because long ago they got under a strong blowout and didn't die, but sort of mutated. Adapted to the effects of radiation and psi-emission, and also began to sense places where rare artifacts are born with their gut. And they sense monsters a mile away. So they definitely must have a "Liquidator". Find the Railroaders, talk to Lector. Maybe you'll manage to agree with him and obtain the needed art.
Alright. But how do I find these guys? Can you tell more precisely?

Means, as I already told you, they dwell somewhere on the territory of the Rostok factory construction site. If you bring me the "Liquidator" artifact, I won't remain in debt. I will thank you royally.
Understood everything. Moving out to the Wild Territory.
Pathfinder, I brought you the "Liquidator" artifact. Oh and strange are those Railroaders!
Well, thank you, Strelok, helped out. I won't remain in debt either. Here, take this.
Give it, won't refuse! And here, hold your artifact.
Good afternoon. Are you Lector?
Yes, that's me. What brought you, stalker, to these wild places? Decided to hunt monsters?
No. I have business with you.
Well, then lay out why you came.
They say you are the best artifact seekers and monster hunters in the Zone.

We don't think about it much. Who is better, who is worse. We simply try to survive, that's all. But actually it is quite flattering to hear such things about ourselves always. So what exactly brought you to us?

One good person needed a very rare artifact - "Liquidator". And finding it, as they say, can only be done by such experienced stalkers as you. That's why I came to you for help. By the way, my name is Strelok. Well what, will you help?

You know, Strelok, if you came at another time, then, despite even your flattering speeches in our address, I would have sent you far away. But now we also need some help. Help us, and we will help you. Agreed?
Of course. And what is required to be done?

So: One of our brothers nicknamed Sledgehammer and two of his assistants left three days ago to Yantar to the scientists for "Antizombie". As you see, we are not quite healthy... These are consequences of a powerful blowout we got under a year ago. And we need this preparation to survive and not turn into walking zombies.
I understand... And?

And that Sledgehammer and the guys should have returned yesterday before lunch... We have very little time, need to take preparations urgently, and there are none. People are in critical condition. Look, Alex can't be helped anymore... Had to shoot the poor guy so he wouldn't suffer. In short, I have no one to send to search for the missing group now. And you appeared just handily. Go, find the missing guys. If they are dead, take the Antizombie from them. Should be ten boxes and also one device, determining the date and exact time of the next blowout. Sledgehammer was carrying it to us. This device is also extremely necessary for us. Therefore the task is such: find the missing group or what remains of them and bring ten boxes of Antizombie and the device.
Alright. But where should I look for them?

Well, from Yantar they definitely crossed to the Wild Territory, as the last time they contacted they were already on the road, further than the transition to Yantar. Worth searching there, it's not far from here: As you find yourself on the road, after the tunnel with burners, just go further. Scour every bush there, but find the guys or what remains of them, and most importantly, bring what I ask.
Everything is clear. I'll go, try to find the missing group and bring what is required.
I found the bodies of all three couriers. Apparently, they ran into mutants.
Eh, losses again... Lost six people already lately. Well okay, this is the Zone... Did you bring what we are waiting for?
Yes. I brought ten Antizombies and the device. Is my artifact ready?
Here is the thing... I don't have the artifact you need. But we have one person who knows exactly where it can be found. He is the best among us in searching for rare artifacts and shooting mutants.
And who is this?
His name is Zveroboy, my right hand. Yes, actually, there he appeared, talk to him.
Alright. Take your loot, and I'll go talk to Zveroboy.
Greetings. Are you Zveroboy?
Yes, that's me. Lector told me you are searching.
Well so speak, where do I find the "Liquidator" artifact.

Listen, I will tell you where to find "Liquidator". Just help us one more time, I beg you very much. A new type of mutants appeared here recently. Very similar to boars, but just painfully tenacious. These beasts gave us no peace for a whole month. Mauled two of our brothers to death. We arranged a roundup on them then, from ten barrels barely laid down two: turned out to be a male and female, but didn't find their brood. And now the offspring of these beasts appeared, even more insidious and angry... We can't arrange a roundup on them now, need to patch up wounds. And you, I see, are a capable fellow. Surely can outwit and destroy the mutants. Yes and moreover it will be on your way. And to handle them more deftly, I will give you an M320 handheld grenade launcher and a dozen charges for it. And three F-1 grenades.
Alright, persuaded. Now give details, where to look for the artifact.

As I understand, you will have to give this "Anomaly Liquidator" to the customer, right? And it is a very valuable and necessary thing. And surely you wouldn't mind having one for yourself. So, you are helping us greatly, therefore listen here: "Liquidators" are born only in one place - at Rostok. Look inside the boarded-up house. Radiation is high there, but I think it won't scare you off. Try to get into this house through a hole in the roof. Just be careful, there is a deep pit under the hole. If you fall, you won't get out yourself. And there should be at least two artifacts there. I feel it with my spinal cord, and my flair never failed me in this matter.
Good, deal. I help you one more time. Where were the piglet-boars seen last time?

Piglets, you say... You should have seen them! These will be larger than a chimera. And last time we saw them near the tunnel, which is not far from the transition to Yantar. Three of them were there. Destroy the superboars, definitely take their hooves. Bring three pieces as proof of completed work.
Ok. Give the grenade launcher and I'm moving out.
And insidious beasts they turned out to be! Barely managed.
Well, you are well done! Rid us of danger. Thank you.
Don't mention it. And the grenade launcher is really good. Liked it very much: light, doesn't take much space, and at the same time quite powerful. Cool toy.
Give the hooves. And take this grenade launcher for yourself as a reward.
Thank you. Here, hold the hooves.
Can I be of use in anything else?

Yes, you can. We caught one mercenary here recently, armed to the teeth. He lagged behind his own and, apparently, got lost. So, he had a unique helmet with him, protecting from harmful impact of blowouts, and also a very fancy gun. Well, when we started torturing him, who is he and why he was hanging around here, he spilled everything to us. Mercs plotted some operation in the Zone: Transported weapons and gear on choppers, and someone shot down their choppers. And now they pursue the offenders and try to save their gear and weapons.
So, interesting. And what?

We tortured out of him that they hid three more protective helmets, same as he had, on Yantar not far from the main entrance to the X-16 complex territory. In the area of garages worth searching. And also, probably, slightly further, where the pipe was laid. We really need these very helmets. True, they need to be tuned individually, but we will solve this later with the eggheads.
By the way, and where is this mercenary now?

Where-where... Doesn't matter where. He is no more... In short, will you undertake finding and bringing us three protective helmets on Yantar? And I will give you that mercenary's unique assault rifle for the work. Notable thing, won't regret. Well how?
Labs, agreed.

Well and lastly: from here to Yantar one can get only through Rostok, somewhere must be a path to Yantar, don't know exactly where. Surely only experienced guys, that are in the Bar, can know. Count, for example.
Understood everything, moving out.
Zveroboy, I barely found these three protective helmets.

Well and well done! Give them here, and I prepared the mercenary's gun for you, as promised. Fully cleaned, oiled. In short, like new. Yes, and also Lector wanted to talk to you very much. Approach him.
Well that's glorious. Hold the helmets and give the gun. Can't wait already to see what mercenaries fight with nowadays. I'll talk to Lector now.
Hello, Pathfinder! I found the "Guide" artifact on Rostok.
You are lucky. Let's see where your path is hiding and where it will lead you.
Here, hold the artifact. Just careful, it is very hot.
So-so... Aha, here we clarified the situation. The path leads from Rostok straight to Army Warehouses. Sent the mark of the beginning of the path to your PDA.
Grasped. Thank you, I'll check this path when possible.
Pathfinder. I found the "Guide" artifact at Army Warehouses.
Well, let's look what kind of path we have here.
Here, hold the artifact.
So-so... Aha, everything is clear. The path leads from Army Warehouses to the Dark Valley. Sent the mark of the beginning of the path to your PDA. Look later.
That is good. Thank you, I'll check this path when possible.
Pathfinder. I found the "Guide" artifact at the Cordon.
Let's take a look what secret path will open to us.
Here, hold the artifact.
So-so... Aha, understood. The path leads from the Cordon to Agroprom, bypassing the Garbage. Sent the mark of the beginning of the path to your PDA, look later.
Understood everything. Thank you, I'll check this path when possible.
Pathfinder. I found the "Guide" artifact at Agroprom.
You are a lucky one, Strelok. Let's see what path opens its "embrace" before you.
Here, hold the artifact.
So-so... Aha, interesting. The path leads from Agroprom to the Cordon. Sent the mark of the beginning of the path to your PDA. Look later.
Understood everything. Thank you, I'll check this path when possible.
Hello, did you want something?
Yes, I can offer you, Strelok, a mutually beneficial deal.
O-oh, so you know me too! Well, speak.

I have been waiting for such an experienced stalker as you, Strelok, for a very responsible and secret task. So, the matter is this: the military at the Checkpoint, which is at the Cordon, had a manual for assembling Item 62, aka "Gauss Rifle". Well, I think there is no need to explain what kind of thing this is. So, there were seven parts in the manual in total, each in a separate folder. I say "were", because two months ago some daredevil stalkers caught a soldier from the Checkpoint, and he "bought" his life for information about the location of the manual parts and led the stalkers secretly to the Checkpoint at night. They managed to steal six parts of the manual, but one part remained on the territory of the Checkpoint in some stash, which they didn't have time to reach. The military raised the alarm for the whole garrison then.
Interesting topic. And what happened next?

Next, these daredevils, there were exactly six of them, split up. And everyone took one part of the manual. The military arranged a roundup for these stalkers throughout the Zone. Searched for them for a long time, but couldn't catch them. But, nevertheless, none of this six survived. 

One, having met a small group of familiar stalkers, ran into a pack of hungry pseudodogs together with them somewhere at the Garbage. 
The second decided to hide in the Agroprom undergrounds, and perished there. 
The third climbed for some reason into the X-18 laboratory, which is in the "Dark Valley". He didn't come out of there. 
The fourth disappeared somewhere in the forest on the Radar. He contacted us, apparently, before his death. Said he was hiding in some rocks. 
The fifth, their leader, an experienced Digger, reached as far as Pripyat. His trail is lost somewhere in the area of the hotel. 
The sixth... They chased him longer than others. Wounded him. He then sat out at the scientists' on Yantar for some time. Then, as he patched up his wounds, went to perform some task for the scientists in gratitude for the treatment in laboratory X-16. But, as you guess, he didn't return from there, disappeared somewhere in the labyrinths of X-16...
Wow, things! And how do you know so many details about this case?

Because before going to the Checkpoint for the manual, these very stalkers came to me... And we agreed with them then that they bring the manual "obtained" from the military, and I in return make the "Item". Spare parts are not a problem for me. We were constantly in touch with them, that's why I know approximately where each of them ended his path. In short, it is required to find the bodies of all six stalkers and take all six parts of the manual from them. Besides this, it is necessary to find that very stash on the territory of the Checkpoint at the Cordon, which the guys didn't reach, and pick up the seventh part, and then bring all seven parts of the assembly manual to me. In return, I will assemble a rifle for you according to the brought schematics and give batteries for it. Deal?
Alright, deal. As I find all seven parts, I'll come straight to you.
That's it, Potapov! I found all seven parts of the assembly manual.
Hush, hush! Why are you making noise?
What is it?
What, what... Look how many eyes and ears are around. And the matter is secret. For the information you obtained, anyone is ready to gnaw a throat.
Alright, understood everything. And what's next?

And next is this: you give me all seven parts of the manual now, and I, as agreed, will assemble the rifle and you will receive the first specimen. Got it? But I need some time... In short, it's a delicate matter. Therefore come to me at three in the morning, not earlier. Just look, I will wait for you exactly from three at night to five in the morning. Got it? Only two hours at your disposal. While everything here, in the Bar, is quiet. At other times don't even come, there will be no conversation.
Ok! Agreed. Hold the seven parts of the manual. And after three at night I'm straight to you.
Well? Is everything ready?

Hush-hush! Yes, everything is ready. Here, take the first specimen and batteries. As charges run out, come to me, I'll give new ones. More precisely, sell, understood? Can buy immediately if you want.
Yes, understood everything. Give it here.
Wow! Don't believe my eyes! Semetsky in person.
Yes, it's me. And you, I understand, are Strelok? Yeah, in an interesting place and at an interesting moment we met with you... I know why you are here.

Yes, I am looking for my brother. And you are my last hope. And how did you get here? And what happened to you generally? Everyone has considered you a legend for a long time, one of the mysteries of the Zone. Where are these constant messages about your death from? And what is known to you about the fate of the Captain?

I came here for the sake of this stone, damn it!.. I have been in the Zone from the very beginning. There were few of us then, twenty people, maybe thirty. And everyone strove here, to the center of the Zone. Someone wanted to get rich at the expense of artifacts, someone to learn the secret of the Sarcophagus and the Monolith, and someone simply fled here from worldly cares and problems. And I... I was just young and hot then... Wanted to save the whole world... I had my reasons for that. It was the Captain who pulled me into that insane scam with the hike to the Sarcophagus. I hate him for that! He was stubborn and fearless, but crazy. He liked the Zone, now I know it for sure. He almost "merged" with it, fell in love with it. And I... I wanted just...
So what happened to you then after all? And is my brother still alive?

I wanted to find a way to destroy the Zone. Too much it took from me... Rumors circulated then that in the very heart of the Zone, in the Sarcophagus, there is a magic crystal - the Monolith, which can fulfill one most cherished wish. I naively assumed that I could put an end to the growing Zone in such a way. Believed in a miracle. Fool! Thought that there is no connection between the Zone and the Monolith, and that this is an "Artifact of Fate" that can help... And we and the Captain managed then with the help of our partners to penetrate inside the Sarcophagus and find this cherished stone. Only I and he penetrated the Sarcophagus. I thought that we had one goal with him, but I was mistaken... I made my wish... Captain too.
And what happened to you?

...The Monolith threw me out, like a blind kitten, somewhere in the region of the Red Forest. And the Zone after that expanded even more. What happened later to our friends, with whom we came to the Sarcophagus, I don't know. But the Captain...
What happened to him? And what wish did he make?

He wished for the Zone to share its great power with him. He was ready for the sake of this even to "dissolve" in it. He knew exactly that the Monolith and the Zone - are one whole. So he "became related" to the Zone...
How is that? I didn't understand... So is my brother alive or dead?

Hard to understand... He is neither alive, nor dead. He is now part of the Zone, as he wanted. Only don't know if he is glad about it... He became the most powerful artifact with such properties and power that no one even dreamed of. In short, I cannot explain this to you. You need to see and understand everything yourself.
Yes, but for this first need to find him! Where do I look for my brother? Well or that, who or what he is now?

Getting to him is not simple... You are going to the Control Bunker right now, right? You were sort of sent to find out what is happening there. There you will receive all answers, including about your brother. Only I don't advise you to poke in there. Forget about it and while there is still time, get away from this place! You are unlikely to be able to help your brother with anything anymore, only will ruin your life in vain or just like us, turn into some "original" unmanufactured creation of the Zone.

No! I must walk my path to the end! I believe in luck. It was always with me while I walked here. I swore to myself that I would find my brother or know for sure that he is dead. So, until I received all answers and confirmations, I won't turn from the path.

Well, as you know. You, apparently, are as stubborn and crazy as your brother... I'll give you a last piece of advice: in the Bunker, where you are heading now, great danger awaits you. Try not to lose reason and self-control. Your own mind will be the best weapon there. While your will is strong, you will have at least some chance.
Alright, I understood you. Tell me, and what happened to you next?

The Zone and this damn shard played a cruel joke on me. Turned into the one you see before yourself now... Instead of fulfilling my wish, the Monolith blinded me, plunging into eternal darkness, endowed with sharpened animal senses and gave immortality... Hundreds of times after that I died and rose from the dead, wandering in eternal darkness, having no opportunity to change anything anymore. There are so many holes and scars on my body that no living patch of skin remains at all... Monsters killed me, bullets "caught up", tore apart in anomalies. I have long been not a human at all, but simply another "Miracle of the Zone", like your brother. And the Zone doesn't let me go, its "favorite Zombie".
And why did you come here again, to the Monolith?
I must destroy it... Or let it destroy me. I don't care anymore. I waited for this moment for a very long time. And you helped me get here, clearing the path to the Sarcophagus.
Wait. Maybe you have some other way out?

I have no other way out. And you go, maybe, you will be lucky. And I am here alone... This is my war... Yes, and also here, take. This is a gift to you from me. In gratitude that you helped me get here, into the Sarcophagus, faster.
What is this?

This is "Wind Rose" - a rarest artifact, possessing magical power. Not a single human ever found such, and unlikely will ever be able to find, because "Wind Rose" appears in such places, where only a mutant can get... If you still manage to find your brother, or rather what he is now, then this artifact can help. It will lower the power of "shackles of the mind" for some time. And if the Captain is still able to think and make decisions, if he wants to free himself from his "captivity", then possibly something will work out... And now go... Go away from here, I say!
Alright. I am leaving to the Control Bunker. Thank you and good luck to you.
Hello, Solomon! Long time no see!
Strelok. Have urgent business for you.
Speak.

Yes too much evil spirits bred here lately, especially near generators and in the eastern part of CNPP-2. Yesterday I went for reconnaissance of the area, ran into monsters and accidentally dropped my PDA exactly in the eastern part. Need to return it. There is a lot of important information... Won't be hard to find. It lies somewhere on the asphalt path. Will you take it? And I will give you an exoskeleton, powerful machine gun and ammo for it for this business. With such gear it will be pure entertainment for you to mow down mutants.
Alright, deal. Give the gun and I'm moving out.
I brought your PDA.
Strelok! And I didn't doubt you, well done!
Machine gun is a thing! Returning...

No, keep it for yourself, as a reward. Thank you for everything! Yes, and also. You are going to the bunker now, right? Be careful. The "eggheads" are plotting something serious there with their experiments. Be more attentive. Personally I don't really trust them. Where did they even get there from? Don't understand... Apparently, cleared the entrance from inside the sarcophagus... Well, good luck.
Thank you too. And see you... Well, or just in case, farewell!
And who are You?
And we, Strelok, are those who have been waiting for you for a long time.
How do you know me? Did we meet before?

No, we haven't had the honor to meet you before, but we know everything about you! In some sense we are Gods... Well or almost... We can make people happy, or vice versa. Everything will depend on behavioral instincts and... on the readiness of consciousness to perceive impulses given to it... But this is long to explain.
Everything somehow fits very intricately with you... And why do you, Gods, need me?

Well, you received a task from the Doctor to sneak into the Bunker and find out all secrets and mysteries. Welcome! Come in. We don't bite, will show and tell you everything. We have no secrets for those who came to us themselves. Or, maybe, you changed your mind?
No, didn't change mind. I always bring what started to the end!
Well then, then for a start I will show you the first truth. Are you ready to see what is in reality, and not what we allow to see?
Well, I said that I am ready! I came here for answers!
Is this some kind of prank?
And do we, Strelok, look like clowns?
So it means, all this time you created an illusion in the heads of everyone who tried to find out the truth about your designs?
I already told you that we are almost Gods and can do things that neither you, nor anyone else even guess about.
And what is your goal?

The goal is only one - this is our Zone and we are its masters. And humans, these talking monkeys, have no place here. Together we will never get along. Therefore we will close access for humanity to the center of the Zone and stop any encroachments on our Shrines! And whoever dares and dares to disturb us, will be destroyed.
And why haven't you killed me yet? After all I am a human!

And you still don't understand? Listen to yourself. You are the same as us, "Child of the Zone". Remember how you got into the Zone, what happened to you after the Big Blow. Where, when and most importantly how, you ended up where you were found. You just decided not to think about it and drive away any thoughts about what happened to you. Did you ever wonder why the Zone left you alive then? But in vain. It "created" you, like all of us. You are another new "Form" of life, capable of surviving in the Zone. Let the appearance of a human remain with you, but your essence - is the essence of a mutant! \n\nExcept you no one would have been able to reach here, into the Bunker. And you reached not only because you were sent here, but to a greater extent because you are drawn here, into the very heart of the Zone, like by a magnet. You see, hear and feel not as a human anymore, but as a mutant. Your instincts are sharpened, you are agile, hardy and fearless, like a beast. Your mind is sharp, like a razor blade. You are just afraid to admit this to yourself. Fool! You are trying to fight with yourself, trying to remain human, stifling new abilities granted to you by the Zone. Let yourself go, be who you have long become. Don't torment yourself, but live in harmony with your new home, with the Zone.
I don't believe you. I am a human! Human by appearance and by my essence!
And you are just as stubborn and stupid as your brother.
What?.. You know my brother?

Your brother is no longer your brother. He is part of us, part of the Zone. His inner power and mind serve us now. Want to join him? We can easily arrange this. Only there is no sense in this, believe me. Still everything will be as we want.
What are you talking about! I came here to save him.

Alright, don't worry so much. Anyway you will understand and realize everything yourself soon. And now there is no time. Soon there will be a blowout and an explosion, very powerful and dangerous for everyone. After it a lot in the Zone will change, a lot will fall into its rightful places. Then it will become clear to you too who you really are... And now need to take cover and wait out. We will help you. There is no way back from here anyway. We blocked all exits from the Sarcophagus and Control Bunker. Therefore choose: you go with us into shelter, and we will protect you from the approaching blowout, and you will be saved. Or you will go straight to your brother. You walked here for so long for this after all? But what can happen to your split mind there, when you meet with "brother" - is a complete mystery even for us. Honestly speaking, we are afraid to approach "him" ourselves... Yes and you have no time left for rescue already. Well, what do you choose?
Apparently, I have no other choice... I am going with you.
Go to hell, degenerates, together with your Zone! I am going to my brother!
Sakharov told me that one of your employees disappeared and help is needed.

Yes, Strelok, help is needed. Here is what happened: we sent one of our lab technicians, Lazarev, to Agroprom, to the swamp, so he would conduct tests of a new device there, fixing the level and dynamics of growth of anomalous activity. Well and so he didn't return. Last time he contacted us when he was already there, at the swamp. And then some crackling, and silence on the air...
So, understood. And how can I help?
Need to find out what happened to Lazarev. At least some information is needed. Go to Agroprom, find out what happened there and report the results to us.
Everything is clear, moving out.

Well what, I was at Agroprom, at the swamp. Found the body of lab technician Lazarev. Some strange beasts appeared there, similar to snorks, but excessively tenacious, swamp crawlers. They worked him over...
Ay-ay-ay... And the device? Did you bring the device back?
Yes, here it is.

Very good that you brought us the device. Here is a reward for this. A very rare artifact "Moon Dummy". Does it suit you? Yes, and also... Talk to Dan, please. We have one important matter here, can't be resolved somehow.
"Moon Dummy", of course, suits. Rare artifact. Give it. And I'll talk to Dan definitely.
Can I be of use?

You can. Here not far, on the swamp, which is under the bridge, beasts started living. Very similar to snorks, but only very tenacious, scum. Crawl in circles around our base at night. Any moment, will attack in a pack, we won't fight them off. Swamp Crawlers they call them.
Are you suggesting I shoot these mutants?
Quick-witted. Exactly. Destroy the beasts to the root. Can you handle it? We won't remain in debt.
Of course, I'll handle it. Prepare the reward.
That's it. Dealt with Swamp Crawlers. They won't disturb you anymore.
Well and good job. Hold your fee.
O-oh, give it.
Something else?
Yes, Strelok. There is a little business, true, dangerous.
Dangers - are for me. Lay out, what business.

Here nearby, at the abandoned military checkpoint, which is in the western part of Army Warehouses, not far from the bloodsucker village, a family of Izloms started living. Insidious beasts, I tell you. They strive to sneak onto our base. Need to clear this place of Izloms. I'll pay with loot. Will you take it?
I'll take it. Hope payment will be appropriate.
That's it, Izloms destroyed.
You are a risky man, Strelok. Alone against Izloms... Hardly anyone of my guys is capable of such. Here, hold your reward - AKMN assault rifle. Great thing! Well and a pack of ammo, of course.
Give it, thank you. And I went, many things to do.
What is it again?
One person was looking for you here recently. Introduced himself as Magician. Says, if Strelok appears, let him find him.
Magician, you say... Don't know such one. And what did he want? And where to look for him?
What he wanted from you, he didn't say. Said that he wants to see you very much. Will wait here, in Pripyat, in the hotel. Says to search in one of the rooms.
Clear. Alright, I'll go try to find this Magician. Especially since I, seem to know, who it might be.
O-oh, Mervin? And I thought that it is you looking for me.
Well, hello, student. I've been waiting for you for a long time to return a debt.
What debt?
And this one!
Mervin! What did you hit me so heartily for and took all things?

For your betrayal before the Monolith brotherhood should have killed you altogether. This I still pitied you. Like you, despite everything. Think that it is Doctor, bastard, led you astray from the true path... Well okay, let's consider that we are even.
Alright, even. And what next?

And next... If you want to return your things and weapon, then you'll have to perform something for me. Not the first time for you to walk around Pripyat in one sweater and with a knife? As in our first meeting, I'll give you a pistol and two packs of ammo for it one more time.
Stop mocking! What needs to be done?
KILL FELDSHER!
Feldsher, hi. Such matter here...
What matter, Strelok?
