In short, Mervin lured me to himself, stunned and took all things and weapons. Sent me to kill you. Promised to return everything for this. But don't worry! Of course, I won't do this. I came to you for advice on how to get rid of Mervin and his curses. And return my things and weapons. After all Mervin - he is a sorcerer. Killing him by simple means doesn't seem possible.

Thank you, Strelok, for loyalty. And regarding that Mervin cannot be killed, I will tell you this: "There is no defense against a crowbar, if there is no other crowbar". And I just have something that will help you defeat the sorcerer. As they say: "I am not a magician, I am just learning, but good helps create miracles.".
And what is this mean?

My sawed-off shotgun, modified for a unique special round of crushing power against any evil spirits and devilry, by the way, also made by me. Just for such a case I saved this weapon. Here I see, this hour has come. Well so, I give you the sawed-off shotgun with two rounds, although, think, even one will be enough. And you go and kill Mervin, and rid all of us of one more danger. And regarding your things and weapons don't worry: Ghost knows where Mervin has a stash. I will ask him to go there and pick up all loot and weapons stolen from you. Well, and you as you finish off Mervin, go to Ghost for your things. Well, what do you say?
Give the sawed-off shotgun, Feldsher. I'll waste this wizard.
Hi, Ghost! Feldsher said that you will pick up my things and weapons stolen by him from Mervin's stash.

Yes everything is already with me. Feldsher informed me about your problem, and I wasn't lazy, went and picked up your loot and weapons from Mervin's stash. Good thing I spotted where this creep made himself a stash.
That is good! Well, give then my things and weapons.
Yes, I will give, of course. But only you do one more business for us. Okay?
What is this! I already crawled the whole Zone at your whim! And again, to simply return my things, need to do something! Got me already, honestly.

Come on, don't boil over. Simple matter. Find a crate with dynamite in the Palace of Culture, which mercenaries hid there when they ran things here in Pripyat, and bring it to me. Something I myself couldn't find this crate there, and you are a sharp-eyed man, surely will find. Well and I will say where I hid your things. Yes, here, take a suit for now, two F-1 grenades, a kalash and a pack of ammo.
Alright. Give, I'll do everything.
I found the crate with dynamite.
That is glorious. Give it here. Your things are in the hotel, in a closed room. Key from it I don't know where, look for another way to climb inside.
Here, hold the crate.
Hi, Dan. Can I be of use further?

There is one task, very important. Sakharov gave it to me, and I can't send anyone right now. And can't leave myself. It's uneasy here now. Need to find three laser disks with information that represents great value for scientists. These disks are about five years old, but information recorded on them is of very great importance right now. I am not really in the know, but Sakharov says that he got old archival records, and he read there that many years ago, after the second explosion and powerful blowout occurred at the CNPP, a group of military scientists accompanied by a special forces detachment was sent to the Zone. \n\nTheir task was to study strange phenomena that started immediately after that blowout. This group stayed then in the closed Zone for about three months, and then something happened and connection with them was interrupted. A week later two special forces soldiers from that security detachment came, or rather crawled to the Checkpoint. They were in terrible condition, said something incoherent and implausible. They were considered insane and sent to a mental hospital. No one else returned from the group and no one was found, although a search operation was organized immediately.
Meaning we are talking about the very first expedition to study the Zone?

Yes, this is that very first expedition... So, listen further: Those two soldiers died in the hospital from an excessively high dose of radiation, which they caught in a week while getting out to the Checkpoint. One doctor who observed them in the hospital wrote down everything they told about their misadventures in his diary. This doctor was a friend of Sakharov and when he learned that he was going to work in the Zone, gave him his diary. Among other things, there was information that those first scientists conducted observations of strange metamorphoses occurring with animals. \n\nJudging by records from the diary, under the supervision of scientists in their field laboratory were several caught specimens of dogs, one pig and a dozen rats, which were kept in cages and constantly taken some tests. These animals changed literally before eyes, mutation process went at furious pace in them, and they turned into terrible beasts.
Well, this is all interesting. And what do disks with information have to do with it?

Don't interrupt! Further it says that a month after observations of mutants began, an emergency occurred: Somehow the beasts managed to break out, and they smashed the entire laboratory and damaged most of the scientific equipment, including computers on which all research archives were stored. Mauled three guards and one scientist. Managed to shoot two dogs, all others hid in the forest not far from the camp. As those soldiers said, after this a decision was immediately made to curtail work and urgently return, as delaying and waiting for help became very dangerous. \n\nAll test results and all observations that were conducted, it seemed, were lost. But it turned out that one of the scientists the day before the tragedy recorded all data on three laser disks, which these two special forces soldiers were instructed to take with them and move out as soon as possible to deliver information to the Big Land. The remaining members of the group planned to pack equipment, dismantle the camp and move out a day after them. But, as we know now, none of the remaining survived. And those two on the way fell into a trap to mutants. Escaping, they had to dump all their gear, including the backpack in which the disks lay along with provisions.
What things! And where to find that backpack with disks now, lost five years ago? And, by the way, why is five-year-old information so important right now?

Those research results. They are priceless, and should reveal the secret and primary cause of mutations of living organisms in the Zone, as they were conducted at the very first stages, immediately after that blowout in two thousand six. Finding disks will be uneasy, but possible. The backpack in whose pocket they lay has already either rotted or mutants tore it apart. But nothing should have happened to the disks. They were in special high-strength plastic cases. Animals don't eat plastic, and if any of the stalkers found them, it would have been known long ago. The place where special forces soldiers dumped their things, according to their description most resembles the territory we now call the Garbage. A landmark on the terrain where to search - is somewhere in ravines, behind one of the garbage heaps. Well what, will you undertake finding those three disks? I won't remain in debt.
Alright, I'll try to help.
Hello, Dan! Well what, found I the disks.
That is great! What, all three?
Yes, all three. Oh and had to climb ravines at the Garbage. A reward is due from you!
Of course! Here, take in reward "SKS Carbine" and a couple of packs of ammo for it.
Won't refuse a good carbine, give. And here are your disks. Take and see you.
Greetings to you, Lector. Zveroboy said that you have business for me.
Yes, there is something interesting for you here. You are a stalker and surely heard that there is a place, where a real Klondike of artifacts is. But, probably, don't really believe in this, right?
Well yes, heard something similar. There were talks that such place exists, but hard to believe in it.

And you believe, this place really exists. And rare artifacts are dirt cheap there. Only discovering them is not given to everyone. Something is needed for this. I can tell you how to find that Klondike and stock up on arts nicely. Want?
Won't refuse such offer. And what is required from me in return?
And in return for this information you bring me one artifact - "Controller's Heart". Bring, and I open the secret to you.
Agreed. Will bring I you "Controller's Heart".
Well here, look, brought I you "Controller's Heart". Tell, how find Klondike of artifacts and your heart.

Brisk you fellow! Well, listen here: this place, as you, probably, know by hearsay, is located in Dark Valley not far from X-18 laboratory complex. There is a lowland behind the hill, here in it is the Klondike. Only far not everyone destined to see artifacts there, because for this need to have something with oneself.
And what is it?

Need, that you have with oneself one artifact. Called "Snake Eye". It as if is catalyst for that place. Actually, from it all started. Exactly "Snake Eye" turned out in that place where formed immediately several anomalies and began process of unseen before transmutations. Finding this art is very hard. Had I one. I gave it to one brother named Nut for bringing us very needed medicines. Well so, I know, where can find one more such artifact. And then will open before you "Magic Valley".
Don't torment, tell faster.

What impatient you are! Well, listen here: can find it in forest on Radar near small gap in fencing from barbed wire between two boulders. As find "Snake Eye", so go to Dark Valley. Search cherished lowland and collect artifacts. Understood all?
Yes, everything clear. Thank you for valuable information. Going search "Snake Eye" in forest on Radar.
Greetings to you, Wanderer! Sviblov said that you can suggest about one curious little thing.
And good health to you, stalker. What thing? Show.
Here look, some Amulet. Emits radiation a little, true.
Very rare thing, I tell you. And very valuable. And I even know what it is and for what.
Well, speak, don't torment.

So: this is one of six ancient magic Amulets. I saw similar at one old digger in Pripyat. He told me story about these Amulets. In short, as I already said, there are six in total. That, which you have - is Amulet of first order. And that, which saw I at Digger was of third order. Digger that sly man was, with some young stalkers hunted for various unusual and rare things and mysteries of Zone. So they just at that time searched through whole Zone these very Amulets. He showed me one Amulet and drawings of others, scanned from some ancient book. Asked, if discover such, then carry to him. And he promised pay well. Where these ancient pagan Amulets appeared in Zone, he didn't say...
So-so, interesting. And why are these Amulets so valuable?

Each by itself special value doesn't represent. But if collect all six, then will happen process of catalyzation, and these six Amulets turn into Talisman, which doubles protective properties of all six taken together, and besides this adds something its own. And also, it is absolutely not radioactive. Five ordinal Amulets have various protective properties, and sixth is exactly that very catalyst which will put in action ancient magic. In short, if collect all six ordinal amulets, then can get unique protective Amulet. If hang it on belt, owner will receive very big protection from damages of various character.
Wow things, mysticism some. Somehow weakly believed in all this.

And you try find all six and check. I look, you fellow sly and curious. Especially since Digger that from Pripyat. Say, died recently under strange circumstances. Where exactly don't know, but say, that last time him somewhere in center of Pripyat saw. So that no one more secrets of Zone scout. Maybe and find him when. More precisely, what from him remained, of course. Suddenly and Amulet that at him turns out. 

By the way, people said, that one of his partners one more Amulet seemingly found. But and he, poor guy, also perished somewhere on Yantar, in laboratory X-16, when already almost left from it by underground catacombs. Either on monster some ran there, or something else. 

One more owner of amulet, by rumors, was dishonest on hand. Traded he that offered service on search of rare artifacts. Took from stalkers prepayment, and work often didn't do. Scammer, in short, was. For this and paid. Him himself later "scammed" - ordered bring something from village of bloodsuckers and gave specially spoiled kalash. Jammed barrel not weakly after five shots. Here there, in Bloodsucker Village, he and couldn't fight off ghouls. Tore him to pieces. And man brave, say, was. So that, possibly, in that village, on Army warehouses lies one more amulet. Places there unpopulated, therefore chance find exists. Where other amulets search, I don't know. In short, dare, Strelok! And I to you on PDA descriptions of all six Amulets send, just in case.
Intrigued you me, Wanderer! Thanks for valuable information. Now won't be me peace, until all six Amulets not collect.
Pathfinder?! And what you here doing?
Doctor me sent cover you. I sneaked on CNPP from north through Limansk. There is path one there, secret.
Glad you see, buddy! What will do?
Someone blocked entrance to Bunker from CNPP. Now there so simply not get. But exists one option.
Which? Speak.

Well, you know about my abilities open "Secret Trails". Well so, Solomon gave me one artifact - "Guide", found by him long ago in Sarcophagus. "Guide" quite old, but, nevertheless, it shows, that transition from Sarcophagus to Bunker still works, but back already no. Mark I you send on PDA. You need hurry. Return to Sarcophagus, Strelok, find there entrance to Bunker. I can't with you go, as by "Secret Trail" can pass only one. Therefore I will wait here. Hope, you manage open from inside passage to Bunker from CNPP, and then we together figure out, what to what.
Understood all. Going to Sarcophagus, wait.
